Posts.Content: Oct 21, 2007 09:46PM bellywelly wrote: Hello everyone. I am waiting for the results of my lung scan - 2 "vague" spots were seen on my routine yearly x-ray. Expect that to mean that I am starting with mets to my left lung after being cancer free since mastectomy in 2001 followed by 6 months of chemo. Am interested in hearing what treatment others are on for lung mets and how effective treatment has been. Needless to say I am devastated and in total panic.  Looking forward to hearing from you.
Posts.Title: Diagnosed yesterday with BC tumor spread to lungs NYCarol bellywelly
